description: Updates which users in a workspace have the Grafana Admin or Editor roles.

parameters.name: updateInstructionBatch
parameters.description: An array of structures that contain the permission updates to make. (dict) --- Contains the instructions for one Grafana role permission update in a UpdatePermissions operation. Specifies whether this update is to add or revoke role permissions. The role to add or revoke for the user or the group specified in users. A structure that specifies the user or group to add or revoke the role for. (dict) --- A structure that specifies one user or group in the workspace. The ID of the user or group. Pattern: ^([0-9a-fA-F]{10}-|)[A-Fa-f0-9]{8}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{12}$ Specifies whether this is a single user or a group.

nested_params.name: action
nested_params.description: Specifies whether this update is to add or revoke role permissions.

nested_params.name: role
nested_params.description: The role to add or revoke for the user or the group specified in users.

nested_params.name: users
nested_params.description: A structure that specifies the user or group to add or revoke the role for.

nested_params.name: id
nested_params.description: The ID of the user or group. Pattern: ^([0-9a-fA-F]{10}-|)[A-Fa-f0-9]{8}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{12}$

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: Specifies whether this is a single user or a group.

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace to update.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: An array of structures that contain the errors from the operation, if any.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: Specifies whether this update is to add or revoke role permissions.

nested_items.name: role
nested_items.description: The role to add or revoke for the user or the group specified in users.

nested_items.name: users
nested_items.description: A structure that specifies the user or group to add or revoke the role for.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the user or group.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Specifies whether this is a single user or a group.
